outputs.output_descr: SFDA recently developed its second strategic plan from 2012 to 2016 which focuses mainly on building broad and deep capabilities, ensure thoroughness, transparency, and consistency in enforcement and communication, and complete the coverage of all relevant areas. Where this project documents with the technical assistant of UNDP focuses on the  following outputs; 1- Capacity development of SFDA; 2- Ensure thoroughness, transparency, and consistency in enforcement and communication; 3- Complete the coverage of all relevant areas as per SFDA's mandate; 4-  Develop systems and processes to improve pro-activity in addressing emerging risk

project_descr: To support Saudi Food and Drug Authority to implement the Second Strategic Plan
project_title: Support SFDA second strategic plan implementation

subnational.name: Saudi Food and Drug Authority, Riyadh
